name: Elite City Sniper Shooter 3d - Free Shooting Game
name_original: Elite City Sniper Shooter 3d - Free Shooting Game
description:
City Sniper Shooting is about sniper shooter soldier trained as a commando and assigned the task to target the enemies forces main strong hold in the city.

All of the missions are secret so you have to be very careful about enemies alarm. As if enemies alarmed their commando will come down and kill you. be sharp , quick and pinpoint to unleash all of enemies soldiers.

*** Main Features ***
*** real sniper 3d simulation controls
*** lots of modern sniper weapons
*** nice war effects
*** real enemies AI
*** realistic sounds
*** very professionally designed graphics for mobiles
*** 45 different levels in 3 different regions
